plot: A team of scientists create a pair of genetically modified "superbeings", but they must thwart Russian agents who are out to capture their creations.
title: Mutants in Paradise
plot_es: A team of scientists create a pair of genetically modified "superbeings", but they must thwart Russian agents who are out to capture their creations.
plot_en: A team of scientists create a pair of genetically modified "superbeings", but they must thwart Russian agents who are out to capture their creations.
